input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following product features and product specification information.

Product specification:
DG Performance 04-4103 - RCM Steel Exhaust (Black) for Yamaha Tri-Moto 225 (1983-1986 )

Product features:
RCM - Great performance and phenominal value!
The midpipe diameter and gets larger as it gets to the muffler body to help scavenge exhaust gases from the engine and increase power
Better throttle response and a smoother power delivery
RCM stands for Reverse Cone Megaphone.
Steel construction

Product description:
input_text.Response A: The DG Performance RCM Steel Exhaust for Yamaha Tri-Moto 225 is designed to deliver phenomenal power and performance. The exhaust features a midpipe that gets larger as it gets to the muffler body, helping to scavenge exhaust gases from the engine and increase power. The RCM exhaust also provides better throttle response and a smoother power delivery. The exhaust is constructed from high-quality steel for durability and reliability. It also features a reverse cone megaphone design that delivers optimal performance. The DG Performance RCM Steel Exhaust is a great investment for Yamaha Tri-Moto 225 owners looking to improve their bike's performance and sound.
input_text.Response B: The iCandy Combat Thermal Execution Targets Shooter Targets are designed to be used at shooting ranges. They are made in the USA and come in a 13x19 size. These targets are made of thick paper and feature the iCandy Combat design. They are perfect for adults and children who enjoy target shooting!

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.

label_annotations.feedback: A is the only option as B makes no sense.
